970870.name: 1001 Jigsaw. Earth Chronicles
970870.description:
What do you know about our planet?
Special edition! 1001 unique photos!
More than 100 hours of gameplay!
The unique game mode.
Save you game progress at any time!
Achievements and trpohies for venturous players.
Funny animals, unusual plants and beautiful landscapes... Open the whole world in one game!

1. We decided to present this special edition for jigsaw lovers!
2. More than 100 hours of gameplay.
3. 1001 unique photos.
4. Save your game progress at any time.
970870.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 俄语
